quest.name: Shock-full of Eggcitement
journal:
Nonotta wants you to keep the truth of the eggshilaration system a secret, cross your heart and hope to die.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

You promise Nonotta not to reveal the eggshilaration system's true nature to Jihli. Her mind set at ease, she turns her attention back to the festivities, and directs you to speak with her fellow Dreamer Motte when you are ready to ride on eggback.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

Motte gives you a rundown of the eggshilaration system's functionality, namely how to launch the shockobo. Hop on the egg now and use the shockobo on Nonotta.

※Speak with Motte at Hyrstmill to ride the eggshilaration system.

You use the shockobo on Nonotta, and it proves effective even on its creator, who shrieks out loud for the fright. Unfortunately, that effect was lost on Jihli, a result which has left Nonotta disheartened. For now, do your part in the festivities by seeking out three festival participants in the Twelveswood and startling them with the shockobo. Once you have three shock eggs for your troubles, deliver them to Nonotta.

※Speak with Motte at Hyrstmill to ride the eggshilaration system.
You have startled three people and earned three shock eggs. Take them back to Nonotta at Hyrstmill.

No sooner do you hand Nonotta the eggs than the three people you received them from come running up. In excited and appreciative tones, they tell of a rock-riding spriggan that gave them the shock of their lives. The news leaves Nonotta puzzled and perturbed, as spriggans aren't part of the plan. The creature in question has since headed to Gridania, and it seems likely that trouble will follow...
objectives: Ride the eggshilaration system and launch the shockobo at Nonotta.
Ride the eggshilaration system and launch the shockobo at festival participants.
Deliver the shock eggs to Nonotta.

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: So, I take it you'll keep the eggshilaration system's true nature a secret?

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: You've put my mind at ease! With that settled, let's get you on eggback, shall we? Motte yonder will assist you; let her know when you are ready.

dialogue.name: MOTTE
dialogue.text: You wish to ride the eggshilaration system? But of course!

dialogue.name: MOTTE
dialogue.text: Hop on, and you should see a button. That's for launching the shockobo, a lifelike, shock-inducing chocobo doll. Why don't you try using it now on Nonotta? She won't mind, trust me!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Launch the shockobo at Nonotta to give her a fright. The action can be selected from the pet hotbar.

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: Motte yonder will help you onto the eggshilaration system; let her know when you are ready.

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: Uwaaah! Oh, my goodness... The shockobo never fails to work on me, and it's my brainchild.

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: <sigh> If only it worked half as well on Jihli... When we used it on her, she simply chuckled and said, “Such a sense of humor the Archons must have had!”

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: Ack, but I shouldn't complain. Suffice it to say none of this is for Jihli's ears.

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: At any rate, the show must go on. And from this point on, your role in the festivities begins in earnest.

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: Festival participants are scattered throughout the Twelveswood. Find them and startle them silly with the shockobo. In return they'll give you shock eggs, which you can exchange for unique prizes.

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: To begin with, try startling, say, three people. When you have their eggs, bring them back to me.

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: Ah, the very image of Jihli's vision! Now, you handle the egg like an Archon, but how well can you handle the shockobo?

dialogue.name: MOTTE
dialogue.text: Oh? Fell off the egg, did you? Never you mind─given the shape, it's bound to happen. Here, let me help you back on.

dialogue.name: ACTOR02422
dialogue.text: Uwaaah! Twelve have mercy! 'Tis a demon bird, risen from the seventh hell to reave my soul! Woe is me! I am...I am undone!

dialogue.name: ACTOR02422
dialogue.text: ...Well, how was it? My performance, that is. I'm an aspiring actor, you see, and I joined in Hatching–tide so I could practice my craft. Next time, I believe I'll explore...denial. Yes, just a hint to add depth to the character's vulnerabilities.

dialogue.name: ACTOR02422
dialogue.text: Ah, but before I forget, this shock egg's for you. And with that, it's back to rehearsing for me.

dialogue.name: MAN02422
dialogue.text: Gah! S-Seven hells, I swear it's worse when you know it's comin'. So, er, what happens now? The chocobo lays a gemstone?

dialogue.name: MAN02422
dialogue.text: ...No? Should've known it was too good to be true. More's the pity─was the main reason I volunteered for this. You can't put much store by dreams, bad as I feel for that Jihli lass.

dialogue.name: MAN02422
dialogue.text: Anyroad, here's your shock egg. Gotta hand out as many as I can if I wanna collect my prize.

dialogue.name: WOMAN02422
dialogue.text: Eeeeeek! M-My heart fairly stopped. After so many frights, you think you'd get used to it...

dialogue.name: WOMAN02422
dialogue.text: But I must say, the egg never ceases to amaze me. How in the world do they make it hover like that?

dialogue.name: WOMAN02422
dialogue.text: Oh, but I owe you a shock egg, for a fine shock rendered. Loud as I scream each time, I find the sensation quite addictive. My thanks, adventurer!

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: You seem to have mislaid the egg, adventurer. Pun intended. Talk to Motte, and she'll help you back on it.

dialogue.name: ACTOR02422
dialogue.text: Won't someone launch a shockobo at me already? I'm itching to test out a new variation on a theme of “startled.”

dialogue.name: MAN02422
dialogue.text: If you're not gonna fire a shockobo at me, bugger off. I've got shock eggs I need to give out.

dialogue.name: WOMAN02422
dialogue.text: Oh, where's my next shock coming from? The suspense is too much to bear!

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: Ah, welcome back. Have your startling efforts met with success, and you have the shock eggs to show for it?

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: Three eggs, precisely as ordered! You've done well, my friend.

dialogue.name: ACTOR02422
dialogue.text: Miss Dreamer! Miss Dreamer!

dialogue.name: WOMAN02422
dialogue.text: Hells' bells, that was a shock an' a half! You never mentioned there'd be others out there tryin' to startle us!

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: Others? Whatever are you talking about?

dialogue.name: MAN02422
dialogue.text: The spriggan ridin' a rock, what else? Fella appeared without warnin' an' gave me the fright of my life. I fair soiled myself!

dialogue.name: ACTOR02422
dialogue.text: I as well! It was all so real and visceral, I didn't even have to act! Joining in the festival was the best decision ever!

dialogue.name: WOMAN02422
dialogue.text: Hear, hear! Ah, but the exquisite flush of the fright begins to fade. I'll need another one soon. Perhaps if I were to follow the spriggan to Gridania... Oh, and thank you, Miss Dreamer! I haven't had this much fun in a long while!

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: Er...y-you're welcome?

dialogue.name: NONOTTA
dialogue.text: Um, adventurer? Rock-riding spriggans aren't part of the plan, and I have a terrible feeling about this. We may have need of your aid beyond simply startling townsfolk.

dialogue.name: MOTTE
dialogue.text: How fares the startling effort, adventurer? When you've collected three shock eggs, be sure to take them to Nonotta.
